author: chiheiro252
title: chiheiro252
text: Having used Playtex tampons for so long, I was use to the type of applicator they use; however, this product uses less plastic for the tampon applicator. That's awesome to me because it's not as wasteful! As for the tampon itself, it absorbs better than any tampon I've used. Typically, no matter what I do, no matter how often I change my tampon, it always leaked. As a solution, I always had to use panty liners, which is annoying since I chose a tampon to be free from any type of pad. The first time I used this product, I had no leakage. Zilch. Nada. Outside of the design of the tampon, part of me feels like it has to do with it being 100% cotton. From my experience with dish rags and towels, cotton is extremely absorbent, and quite possibly the most absorbent. Finally, I truly do love knowing what I am putting into my body - 100% cotton. Cotton itself is rough and I was afraid of that with this product, but it's not! it's very well put together. It's safe and we know what it is made from. It is a prone area of our bodies and it's sweet that I can take care of myself with a product that not only works better than what I've experienced in the past, but also gives me security.
